comment: This Beer was amazing. Fermented it at 60F for 7 days and then bottled. After 5 days in the bottle it was carbed and delicious. Super malty, just a hint of smoke that gives an organic/earthy taste. Very balanced and extremely drinkable. Gave a 6 pack to some bud drinkers and they loved it, they wont stop bugging me to brew more. Going to do this for my first 12 gallon batch.
